name: 宋國明
objective:
瞭解CMOS 超大型積體電路之電路元件特性及其組合電路之分析與設計方法，其內容包含：金氧半電晶體電路特性分析、電路性能評估、電路模擬、組合電路設計、序向電路設計、設計方法分析、測試與驗證、CMOS案例討論與Verilog HDL設計等課程內容。
This course covers the electric specification, circuit analyses, and design methods of the CMOS VLSI. The contents of this course include: Circuit characterization, performance estimation, Circuit simulation, Combinational circuit, Sequential circuit, Design methodology, Testing and verification, CMOS case study, and Verilog HDL design.
schedule:
Week 1 Course introduction
Week 2 CMOS Transistor Theory
Week 3 Nonideal Transistor Theory
Week 4 DC and Transient Response
Week 5 Logic Effort
Week 6 Power
Week 7 Wires
Week 8 SPICE Simulation (Homework 1)
Week 9 Midterm exam: 30%
Week 10-11 Circuit Families and Combinational Circuit
Week 12-13 Sequential Circuit Design 
Week 14 Datapath Functional Units
Week 15 Scaling and Economics
Week 16 Circuit Pitfalls
Week 17 Verilog HDL design (Homework 2)
Week 18 Final exam: 30%
scorePolicy:
Coursework and Grading:
Course grades will be based on the following work. The final weighting may be changed slightly.
Class participation: 10%
Homework: 30% 
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
